Your Holiness!?\""},{"lineNumber":178052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いたのか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You were here...\""},{"lineNumber":178053,"originalJapaneseLine":"「実はちょっと前からいました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Actually, I've been here for a little while.\""},{"lineNumber":178054,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより、その手紙に書かれているのは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, what's written on that letter"},{"lineNumber":178055,"originalJapaneseLine":"　神の使う文字ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"is the script used by the gods.\""},{"lineNumber":178056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「読めるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Can you read it?\""},{"lineNumber":178057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、法王なので」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, because I'm the Pope.\""},{"lineNumber":178058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、面白そうだ。読め」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, sounds interesting. Read it.\""},{"lineNumber":178059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sure.\""},{"lineNumber":178060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um...\""},{"lineNumber":178061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドンドンぱふぱふー♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don don pafufafu~♪"},{"lineNumber":178062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おめでとーーーーう☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"Congratulations~~~☆\""},{"lineNumber":178063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何百年もかかるから心配したけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was worried it would take hundreds of years,"},{"lineNumber":178064,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回ようやく試練達成ー☆","translatedEnglishLine":"but this time the trial has finally been world,"},{"lineNumber":178068,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ようやく正しい場所で捨ててくれましたね、","translatedEnglishLine":"but at last, it's been discarded in the correct place,"},{"lineNumber":178069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ホッとしましたー☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm relieved☆\""},{"lineNumber":178070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!?\""},{"lineNumber":178071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……どうやら今まで捨てる場所、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It wrong.\""},{"lineNumber":178073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんな馬鹿な……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N- No way...!?\""},{"lineNumber":178074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、今までの手紙！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, the letters from before!"},{"lineNumber":178075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これも解読してみて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Try decoding these too!\""},{"lineNumber":178076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um...\""},{"lineNumber":178077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残念、そこじゃないよー☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, that's not the place☆\""},{"lineNumber":178078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だそうです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's what it says.\""},{"lineNumber":178079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええーーーーっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehhhh!?!\""},{"lineNumber":178080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「JAPANの端っこじゃなくて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not the edge of Japan,"},{"lineNumber":178081,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大陸の端っこで捨てろって意味だったんだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"but it meant to discard it at the edge of the continent.\""},{"lineNumber":178082,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then...\""},{"lineNumber":178083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ワタシの一族……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My tribe..."},{"lineNumber":178084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずっと、ずーっと、捨てる場所……","translatedEnglishLine":"for so long, so very long, the place to discard..."},{"lineNumber":178085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　間違えて……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"has been wrong...?\""},{"lineNumber":178086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドジな一族だなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What a clumsy tribe.\""},{"lineNumber":178087,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーーーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":178088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「試練達成の褒美に力を授けちゃいまーす♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As a reward for completing the trial, I'll grant you power♪"},{"lineNumber":178089,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やったね☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"There you go☆\""},{"lineNumber":178090,"originalJapaneseLine":"「力？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Power?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん、いつも通り手紙も入っている」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, as usual, there's also a letter inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「神様からのありがた〜い手紙が、
毎年瓶の中に同封されているのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is enclosed every year inside the bottle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか文字？　が書いてあるが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There are some characters? written on it, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔の偉い巫女様が言うことには、
この文字が我々の一族を指していて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: these characters refer to our tribe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この文字が大地と精霊……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: these characters stand for the earth and spirits..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父になり母になり、わたし自身となりなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: become father, become mother, and become myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすればわたしはあなたがたと多くを語るまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then I will not speak much to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平和と恵みを与えることを約束しよう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I promise to grant peace and blessings..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「簡単に言えば大地と精霊に感謝して生きれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Simply put, if you live with gratitude for the earth and spirits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また今年も健やかに暮らせますよってとこね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you can live healthily again this year."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実はちょっと前からいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Actually, I've been here for a little while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより、その手紙に書かれているのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, what's written on that letter
is the script used by the gods."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何百年もかかるから心配したけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was worried it would take hundreds of years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回ようやく試練達成ー☆
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but this time the trial has finally been completed☆

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も自分のことのように嬉しいでーす♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm just as happy as if it were about me♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今まで世界の果てを勘違いしていたけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, we misunderstood the edge of the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく正しい場所で捨ててくれましたね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but at last, it's been discarded in the correct place,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうやら今まで捨てる場所、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems that all this time, the place where we discarded,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違えていたようですね」
大陸の端っこで捨てろって意味だったんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it meant to discard it at the edge of the continent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと、ずーっと、捨てる場所……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for so long, so very long, the place to discard...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試練達成の褒美に力を授けちゃいまーす♪
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As a reward for completing the trial, I'll grant you power♪

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
